aes_ccm.h File Reference

Detailed Description

AES-CCM developer API header. This header file contains definitions, enumerations, structures, and function declarations used for AES-CCM operations.

Since:
3.0.6
Version:
5.0.5 and later
! Flags No flag definitions are required to use this file.

! External Functions This file contains the following public ($extern$) function declarations:

  • AESCCM_encrypt
  • AESCCM_decrypt

This graph shows which files directly or indirectly include this file:

Go to the source code of this file.

MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AESCCM_decrypt (MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) ubyte M, ubyte L, ubyte *keyMaterial, sbyte4 keyLength, const ubyte *nonce, ubyte *encData, ubyte4 eDataLength, const ubyte *authData, ubyte4 aDataLength, const ubyte U[])
